description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. How well do you know your controller? Prove it. Vega Magnitude adds a new twist to the traditional arcade shooter. Each button on the Xbox controller fires that same colored bullet (or creates a shield with the R-Trigger) and subsequently destroys that same colored enemy. How high will your score rank on the leaderboard? This game powered by Torque X.  www.garagegames.com
